Class Player_Information_Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.Player_Information_Controller

  • public class Player_Information_Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will return all the information required for a player This information will include the number of players and name of players
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    raghavsharda, harmandeep

      • NumberOfPlayer

        public int NumberOfPlayer(int minimum,
                          java.lang.String Mesg,
                          int maximum)
        This function will give the information regarding the player. In this function Spinner model is used to define the minimum and maximum number of players when the user starts the game play.
        Parameters:
        minimum - number of minimum players
        Mesg - message to be passed
        maximum - maximum number of players
        Returns:
        This method will return the Number of players.

        Returns:
